ThingDef.Name: Gun_AtlasPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona atlas pistol
ThingDef.description: [ ATLAS weapons typically have higher damage ] A standard sidearm of Atlas and Crimson Lance troops.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
